item.title: Dollars and Degrees: The Asymmetric Impact of State Appropriations on STEM and Non-STEM Fields
item.description: This paper examines how recreational marijuana legalization (RML) affects first-time college enrollment in the US using a unique college-level dataset and various estimation methods such as difference-in-differences, event study, and synthetic controls.
